MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.22;\r\n\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/proxy/utils/Initializable.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/proxy/utils/UUPSUpgradeable.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/access/OwnableUpgradeable.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts-upgradeable/utils/ReentrancyGuardUpgradeable.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/IERC721.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/IERC721Receiver.sol\";\r\nimport {AggregatorV3Interface} from \"@chainlink/contracts/src/v0.8/shared/interfaces/AggregatorV3Interface.sol\";\r\n\r\n/**\r\n * @title NFTAuctionPlatform\r\n * @dev NFT \u62cd\u5356\u5e73\u53f0\u4e3b\u5408\u7ea6\uff0c\u652f\u6301\u591a\u79cd\u4ee3\u5e01\u51fa\u4ef7\u548c Chainlink \u4ef7\u683c\u9884\u8a00\u673a\r\n */\r\ncontract NFTAuctionPlatform is \r\n    Initializable, \r\n    UUPSUpgradeable, \r\n    OwnableUpgradeable, \r\n    ReentrancyGuardUpgradeable, \r\n    IERC721Receiver \r\n{\r\n    // \u62cd\u5356\u7ed3\u6784\u4f53\r\n    struct Auction {\r\n        address seller;           // \u5356\u5bb6\r\n        uint256 duration;        // \u62cd\u5356\u6301\u7eed\u65f6\u95f4\r\n        uint256 startPrice;      // \u8d77\u59cb\u4ef7\u683c (\u7f8e\u5143\uff0c18\u4f4d\u5c0f\u6570)\r\n        uint256 startTime;       // \u5f00\u59cb\u65f6\u95f4\r\n        bool ended;              // \u662f\u5426\u7ed3\u675f\r\n        address highestBidder;   // \u6700\u9ad8\u51fa\u4ef7\u8005\r\n        uint256 highestBid;      // \u6700\u9ad8\u51fa\u4ef7 (\u7f8e\u5143\uff0c18\u4f4d\u5c0f\u6570)\r\n        address nftContract;     // NFT \u5408\u7ea6\u5730\u5740\r\n        uint256 tokenId;         // NFT Token ID\r\n        address bidToken;        // \u51fa\u4ef7\u4ee3\u5e01\u5730\u5740 (address(0) \u8868\u793a ETH)\r\n        uint256 originalBidAmount; // \u539f\u59cb\u51fa\u4ef7\u91d1\u989d\r\n        uint256 reservePrice;    // \u4fdd\u7559\u4ef7\u683c (\u7f8e\u5143\uff0c18\u4f4d\u5c0f\u6570)\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    // \u652f\u6301\u7684\u4ee3\u5e01\u4ef7\u683c\u9884\u8a00\u673a\r\n    mapping(address => AggregatorV3Interface) public priceFeeds;\r\n    \r\n    // \u8de8\u94fe\u6865\u63a5\u5408\u7ea6\u5730\u5740\r\n    address public crossChainBridge;\r\n\r\n    // \u62cd\u5356\u5b58\u50a8\r\n    mapping(uint256 => Auction) public auctions;\r\n    uint256 public nextAuctionId;\r\n    \r\n    // \u7528\u6237\u7684\u51fa\u4ef7\u8bb0\u5f55 (auctionId => bidder => amount in USD)\r\n    mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => uint256)) public bidRecords;\r\n    \r\n    // \u5e73\u53f0\u8d39\u7387 (1000 = 10%)\r\n    uint256 public platformFeeRate;\r\n    address public feeRecipient;\r\n    \r\n    // \u6700\u5c0f\u62cd\u5356\u65f6\u95f4\r\n    uint256 public constant MIN_AUCTION_DURATION = 1 hours;\r\n    uint256 public constant MAX_AUCTION_DURATION = 30 days;\r\n    \r\n    // \u4e8b\u4ef6\u5b9a\u4e49\r\n    event AuctionCreated(\r\n        uint256 indexed auctionId,\r\n        address indexed seller,\r\n        address indexed nftContract,\r\n        uint256 tokenId,\r\n        uint256 startPrice,\r\n        uint256 reservePrice,\r\n        uint256 duration\r\n    );\r\n    \r\n    event BidPlaced(\r\n        uint256 indexed auctionId,\r\n        address indexed bidder,\r\n        address indexed bidToken,\r\n        uint256 bidAmount,\r\n        uint256 usdValue\r\n    );\r\n    \r\n    event AuctionEnded(\r\n        uint256 indexed auctionId,\r\n        address indexed winner,\r\n        uint256 finalPrice,\r\n        address paymentToken\r\n    );\r\n    \r\n    event PriceFeedUpdated(address indexed token, address indexed priceFeed);\r\n    \r\n    /// @custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow constructor\r\n    constructor() {\r\n        _disableInitializers();\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u521d\u59cb\u5316\u51fd\u6570\r\n     */\r\n    function initialize() external initializer {\r\n        __Ownable_init(msg.sender);\r\n        __UUPSUpgradeable_init();\r\n        __ReentrancyGuard_init();\r\n        \r\n        nextAuctionId = 1;\r\n        platformFeeRate = 250; // 2.5%\r\n        feeRecipient = msg.sender;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u8bbe\u7f6e\u8de8\u94fe\u6865\u63a5\u5408\u7ea6\u5730\u5740\r\n     * @param _crossChainBridge \u8de8\u94fe\u6865\u5408\u7ea6\u5730\u5740\r\n     */\r\n    function setCrossChainBridge(address _crossChainBridge) external onlyOwner {\r\n        crossChainBridge = _crossChainBridge;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u8bbe\u7f6e\u4ef7\u683c\u9884\u8a00\u673a\r\n     * @param tokenAddress \u4ee3\u5e01\u5730\u5740 (address(0) \u8868\u793a ETH)\r\n     * @param priceFeed \u9884\u8a00\u673a\u5408\u7ea6\u5730\u5740\r\n     */\r\n    function setPriceFeed(address tokenAddress, address priceFeed) external onlyOwner {\r\n        priceFeeds[tokenAddress] = AggregatorV3Interface(priceFeed);\r\n        emit PriceFeedUpdated(tokenAddress, priceFeed);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u521b\u5efa\u62cd\u5356\r\n     * @param duration \u62cd\u5356\u6301\u7eed\u65f6\u95f4\uff08\u79d2\uff09\r\n     * @param startPrice \u8d77\u59cb\u4ef7\u683c\uff08\u7f8e\u5143\uff0c18\u4f4d\u5c0f\u6570\uff09\r\n     * @param reservePrice \u4fdd\u7559\u4ef7\u683c\uff08\u7f8e\u5143\uff0c18\u4f4d\u5c0f\u6570\uff09\r\n     * @param nftAddress NFT \u5408\u7ea6\u5730\u5740\r\n     * @param tokenId NFT Token ID\r\n     */\r\n    function createAuction(\r\n        uint256 duration,\r\n        uint256 startPrice,\r\n        uint256 reservePrice,\r\n        address nftAddress,\r\n        uint256 tokenId\r\n    ) external nonReentrant returns (uint256) {\r\n        require(duration >= MIN_AUCTION_DURATION && duration <= MAX_AUCTION_DURATION, \"Invalid duration\");\r\n        require(startPrice > 0, \"Start price must be positive\");\r\n        require(reservePrice >= startPrice, \"Reserve price too low\");\r\n        require(nftAddress != address(0), \"Invalid NFT contract\");\r\n        \r\n        IERC721 nft = IERC721(nftAddress);\r\n        require(nft.ownerOf(tokenId) == msg.sender, \"Not owner of NFT\");\r\n        require(nft.isApprovedForAll(msg.sender, address(this)) || \r\n                nft.getApproved(tokenId) == address(this), \"NFT not approved\");\r\n        \r\n        // \u8f6c\u79fb NFT \u5230\u5408\u7ea6\r\n        nft.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender, address(this), tokenId);\r\n        \r\n        uint256 auctionId = nextAuctionId++;\r\n        \r\n        auctions[auctionId] = Auction({\r\n            seller: msg.sender,\r\n            duration: duration,\r\n            startPrice: startPrice,\r\n            startTime: block.timestamp,\r\n            ended: false,\r\n            highestBidder: address(0),\r\n            highestBid: 0,\r\n            nftContract: nftAddress,\r\n            tokenId: tokenId,\r\n            bidToken: address(0),\r\n            originalBidAmount: 0,\r\n            reservePrice: reservePrice\r\n        });\r\n        \r\n        emit AuctionCreated(auctionId, msg.sender, nftAddress, tokenId, startPrice, reservePrice, duration);\r\n        return auctionId;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u4f7f\u7528 ETH \u51fa\u4ef7\r\n     * @param auctionId \u62cd\u5356 ID\r\n     */\r\n    function placeBidWithETH(uint256 auctionId) external payable nonReentrant {\r\n        require(msg.value > 0, \"Bid must be positive\");\r\n        \r\n        uint256 usdValue = getTokenPriceInUSD(address(0), msg.value);\r\n        _placeBid(auctionId, address(0), msg.value, usdValue);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u4f7f\u7528 ERC20 \u4ee3\u5e01\u51fa\u4ef7\r\n     * @param auctionId \u62cd\u5356 ID\r\n     * @param tokenAddress \u4ee3\u5e01\u5730\u5740\r\n     * @param amount \u4ee3\u5e01\u6570\u91cf\r\n     */\r\n    function placeBidWithToken(\r\n        uint256 auctionId,\r\n        address tokenAddress,\r\n        uint256 amount\r\n    ) external nonReentrant {\r\n        require(amount > 0, \"Amount must be positive\");\r\n        require(tokenAddress != address(0), \"Use placeBidWithETH for ETH\");\r\n        require(address(priceFeeds[tokenAddress]) != address(0), \"Token not supported\");\r\n        \r\n        IERC20 token = IERC20(tokenAddress);\r\n        require(token.balanceOf(msg.sender) >= amount, \"Insufficient balance\");\r\n        require(token.allowance(msg.sender, address(this)) >= amount, \"Insufficient allowance\");\r\n        \r\n        uint256 usdValue = getTokenPriceInUSD(tokenAddress, amount);\r\n        \r\n        // \u8f6c\u79fb\u4ee3\u5e01\u5230\u5408\u7ea6\r\n        token.transferFrom(msg.sender, address(this), amount);\r\n        \r\n        _placeBid(auctionId, tokenAddress, amount, usdValue);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u5185\u90e8\u51fa\u4ef7\u903b\u8f91\r\n     */\r\n    function _placeBid(\r\n        uint256 auctionId,\r\n        address tokenAddress,\r\n        uint256 amount,\r\n        uint256 usdValue\r\n    ) internal virtual {\r\n        Auction storage auction = auctions[auctionId];\r\n        \r\n        require(auction.seller != address(0), \"Auction does not exist\");\r\n        require(!auction.ended, \"Auction ended\");\r\n        require(block.timestamp < auction.startTime + auction.duration, \"Auction expired\");\r\n        require(msg.sender != auction.seller, \"Seller cannot bid\");\r\n        require(usdValue >= auction.startPrice, \"Bid below start price\");\r\n        require(usdValue > auction.highestBid, \"Bid not high enough\");\r\n        \r\n        // \u9000\u8fd8\u4e4b\u524d\u6700\u9ad8\u51fa\u4ef7\u8005\u7684\u8d44\u91d1\r\n        if (auction.highestBidder != address(0)) {\r\n            _refundBidder(auction.highestBidder, auction.bidToken, auction.originalBidAmount);\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        // \u66f4\u65b0\u62cd\u5356\u4fe1\u606f\r\n        auction.highestBidder = msg.sender;\r\n        auction.highestBid = usdValue;\r\n        auction.bidToken = tokenAddress;\r\n        auction.originalBidAmount = amount;\r\n        \r\n        // \u8bb0\u5f55\u7528\u6237\u51fa\u4ef7\r\n        bidRecords[auctionId][msg.sender] = usdValue;\r\n        \r\n        // \u5982\u679c\u62cd\u5356\u5269\u4f59\u65f6\u95f4\u5c11\u4e8e15\u5206\u949f\uff0c\u5ef6\u957f15\u5206\u949f\r\n        uint256 timeRemaining = (auction.startTime + auction.duration) - block.timestamp;\r\n        if (timeRemaining < 15 minutes) {\r\n            auction.duration += 15 minutes;\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        emit BidPlaced(auctionId, msg.sender, tokenAddress, amount, usdValue);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u7ed3\u675f\u62cd\u5356\r\n     * @param auctionId \u62cd\u5356 ID\r\n     */\r\n    function endAuction(uint256 auctionId) external nonReentrant {\r\n        Auction storage auction = auctions[auctionId];\r\n        \r\n        require(auction.seller != address(0), \"Auction does not exist\");\r\n        require(!auction.ended, \"Auction already ended\");\r\n        require(\r\n            block.timestamp >= auction.startTime + auction.duration ||\r\n            msg.sender == auction.seller,\r\n            \"Auction not yet ended\"\r\n        );\r\n        \r\n        auction.ended = true;\r\n        \r\n        if (auction.highestBidder != address(0) && auction.highestBid >= auction.reservePrice) {\r\n            // \u62cd\u5356\u6210\u529f\r\n            _executeSuccessfulAuction(auctionId, auction);\r\n        } else {\r\n            // \u62cd\u5356\u5931\u8d25\uff0c\u9000\u8fd8 NFT\r\n            _executeFailedAuction(auctionId, auction);\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        emit AuctionEnded(auctionId, auction.highestBidder, auction.highestBid, auction.bidToken);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u6267\u884c\u6210\u529f\u7684\u62cd\u5356\r\n     */\r\n    function _executeSuccessfulAuction(uint256 auctionId, Auction memory auction) internal {\r\n        // \u8ba1\u7b97\u5e73\u53f0\u8d39\u7528\r\n        uint256 totalAmount = auction.originalBidAmount;\r\n        uint256 platformFee = (totalAmount * platformFeeRate) / 10000;\r\n        uint256 sellerAmount = totalAmount - platformFee;\r\n        \r\n        // \u8f6c\u79fb NFT \u7ed9\u8d62\u5bb6\r\n        IERC721(auction.nftContract).safeTransferFrom(\r\n            address(this),\r\n            auction.highestBidder,\r\n            auction.tokenId\r\n        );\r\n        \r\n        // \u652f\u4ed8\u5356\u5bb6\u548c\u5e73\u53f0\u8d39\u7528\r\n        if (auction.bidToken == address(0)) {\r\n            // ETH \u652f\u4ed8\r\n            (bool success1, ) = payable(auction.seller).call{value: sellerAmount}(\"\");\r\n            require(success1, \"Payment to seller failed\");\r\n            \r\n            if (platformFee > 0) {\r\n                (bool success2, ) = payable(feeRecipient).call{value: platformFee}(\"\");\r\n                require(success2, \"Platform fee transfer failed\");\r\n            }\r\n        } else {\r\n            // ERC20 \u4ee3\u5e01\u652f\u4ed8\r\n            IERC20 token = IERC20(auction.bidToken);\r\n            require(token.transfer(auction.seller, sellerAmount), \"Payment to seller failed\");\r\n            \r\n            if (platformFee > 0) {\r\n                require(token.transfer(feeRecipient, platformFee), \"Platform fee transfer failed\");\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u6267\u884c\u5931\u8d25\u7684\u62cd\u5356\r\n     */\r\n    function _executeFailedAuction(uint256 auctionId, Auction memory auction) internal {\r\n        // \u9000\u8fd8 NFT \u7ed9\u5356\u5bb6\r\n        IERC721(auction.nftContract).safeTransferFrom(\r\n            address(this),\r\n            auction.seller,\r\n            auction.tokenId\r\n        );\r\n        \r\n        // \u9000\u8fd8\u6700\u9ad8\u51fa\u4ef7\u8005\u7684\u8d44\u91d1\r\n        if (auction.highestBidder != address(0)) {\r\n            _refundBidder(auction.highestBidder, auction.bidToken, auction.originalBidAmount);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u9000\u8fd8\u51fa\u4ef7\u8005\u8d44\u91d1\r\n     */\r\n    function _refundBidder(address bidder, address tokenAddress, uint256 amount) internal {\r\n        if (tokenAddress == address(0)) {\r\n            // \u9000\u8fd8 ETH\r\n            (bool success, ) = payable(bidder).call{value: amount}(\"\");\r\n            require(success, \"ETH refund failed\");\r\n        } else {\r\n            // \u9000\u8fd8 ERC20 \u4ee3\u5e01\r\n            IERC20 token = IERC20(tokenAddress);\r\n            require(token.transfer(bidder, amount), \"Token refund failed\");\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u83b7\u53d6\u4ee3\u5e01\u7684\u7f8e\u5143\u4ef7\u683c\r\n     * @param tokenAddress \u4ee3\u5e01\u5730\u5740 (address(0) \u8868\u793a ETH)\r\n     * @param amount \u4ee3\u5e01\u6570\u91cf\r\n     * @return \u7f8e\u5143\u4ef7\u503c (18\u4f4d\u5c0f\u6570)\r\n     */\r\n    function getTokenPriceInUSD(address tokenAddress, uint256 amount) public view returns (uint256) {\r\n        AggregatorV3Interface priceFeed = priceFeeds[tokenAddress];\r\n        require(address(priceFeed) != address(0), \"Price feed not set\");\r\n        \r\n        (, int256 price, , , ) = priceFeed.latestRoundData();\r\n        require(price > 0, \"Invalid price\");\r\n        \r\n        uint8 decimals = priceFeed.decimals();\r\n        \r\n        // \u5c06\u4ef7\u683c\u8f6c\u6362\u4e3a 18 \u4f4d\u5c0f\u6570\uff0c\u7136\u540e\u4e58\u4ee5\u6570\u91cf\r\n        uint256 priceInUSD = (uint256(price) * (10 ** 18)) / (10 ** decimals);\r\n        return (priceInUSD * amount) / (10 ** 18);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u83b7\u53d6\u62cd\u5356\u4fe1\u606f\r\n     * @param auctionId \u62cd\u5356 ID\r\n     */\r\n    function getAuction(uint256 auctionId) external view returns (Auction memory) {\r\n        return auctions[auctionId];\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u68c0\u67e5\u62cd\u5356\u662f\u5426\u6d3b\u8dc3\r\n     * @param auctionId \u62cd\u5356 ID\r\n     */\r\n    function isAuctionActive(uint256 auctionId) external view returns (bool) {\r\n        Auction memory auction = auctions[auctionId];\r\n        return !auction.ended && \r\n               block.timestamp < auction.startTime + auction.duration &&\r\n               auction.seller != address(0);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u83b7\u53d6\u5269\u4f59\u65f6\u95f4\r\n     * @param auctionId \u62cd\u5356 ID\r\n     */\r\n    function getTimeRemaining(uint256 auctionId) external view returns (uint256) {\r\n        Auction memory auction = auctions[auctionId];\r\n        if (auction.ended || block.timestamp >= auction.startTime + auction.duration) {\r\n            return 0;\r\n        }\r\n        return (auction.startTime + auction.duration) - block.timestamp;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u83b7\u53d6\u7528\u6237\u5728\u6307\u5b9a\u62cd\u5356\u4e2d\u7684\u51fa\u4ef7\u8bb0\u5f55\r\n     * @param auctionId \u62cd\u5356 ID\r\n     * @param bidder \u51fa\u4ef7\u8005\u5730\u5740\r\n     */\r\n    function getUserBidAmount(uint256 auctionId, address bidder) external view returns (uint256) {\r\n        return bidRecords[auctionId][bidder];\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u8bbe\u7f6e\u5e73\u53f0\u8d39\u7387\r\n     * @param newFeeRate \u65b0\u8d39\u7387 (1000 = 10%)\r\n     */\r\n    function setPlatformFeeRate(uint256 newFeeRate) external onlyOwner {\r\n        require(newFeeRate <= 1000, \"Fee rate too high\"); // \u6700\u5927 10%\r\n        platformFeeRate = newFeeRate;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u8bbe\u7f6e\u8d39\u7528\u63a5\u6536\u8005\r\n     * @param newFeeRecipient \u65b0\u7684\u8d39\u7528\u63a5\u6536\u8005\u5730\u5740\r\n     */\r\n    function setFeeRecipient(address newFeeRecipient) external onlyOwner {\r\n        require(newFeeRecipient != address(0), \"Invalid address\");\r\n        feeRecipient = newFeeRecipient;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u7d27\u6025\u60c5\u51b5\u4e0b\u53d6\u6d88\u62cd\u5356\uff08\u4ec5\u6240\u6709\u8005\uff09\r\n     * @param auctionId \u62cd\u5356 ID\r\n     */\r\n    function emergencyCancelAuction(uint256 auctionId) external onlyOwner {\r\n        Auction storage auction = auctions[auctionId];\r\n        require(auction.seller != address(0), \"Auction does not exist\");\r\n        require(!auction.ended, \"Auction already ended\");\r\n        \r\n        auction.ended = true;\r\n        \r\n        // \u9000\u8fd8 NFT\r\n        IERC721(auction.nftContract).safeTransferFrom(\r\n            address(this),\r\n            auction.seller,\r\n            auction.tokenId\r\n        );\r\n        \r\n        // \u9000\u8fd8\u6700\u9ad8\u51fa\u4ef7\u8005\u8d44\u91d1\r\n        if (auction.highestBidder != address(0)) {\r\n            _refundBidder(auction.highestBidder, auction.bidToken, auction.originalBidAmount);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    // ERC721 \u63a5\u6536\u5668\r\n    function onERC721Received(\r\n        address,\r\n        address,\r\n        uint256,\r\n        bytes calldata\r\n    ) external pure override returns (bytes4) {\r\n        return IERC721Receiver.onERC721Received.selector;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    // \u5347\u7ea7\u6388\u6743\r\n    function _authorizeUpgrade(address newImplementation) internal override onlyOwner {}\r\n}","keccak256":"0xfa29688d91a3f046278cdd8eb18c32283e079125cc26be30ea1336bc33d81295","license":"MIT"},"contracts/task3/NFTAuctionPlatformV2.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.22;\r\n\r\nimport \"./NFTAuctionPlatform.sol\";\r\n\r\n/**\r\n * @title NFTAuctionPlatformV2\r\n * @dev NFT \u62cd\u5356\u5e73\u53f0\u5347\u7ea7\u7248\u672c\uff0c\u6dfb\u52a0\u4e86\u65b0\u529f\u80fd\r\n */\r\ncontract NFTAuctionPlatformV2 is NFTAuctionPlatform {\r\n    // \u65b0\u7248\u672c\u6dfb\u52a0\u7684\u529f\u80fd\r\n    \r\n    // \u62cd\u5356\u7c7b\u578b\u679a\u4e3e\r\n    enum AuctionType {\r\n        ENGLISH,     // \u82f1\u5f0f\u62cd\u5356\uff08\u4ef7\u683c\u9012\u589e\uff09\r\n        DUTCH,       // \u8377\u5170\u5f0f\u62cd\u5356\uff08\u4ef7\u683c\u9012\u51cf\uff09\r\n        SEALED_BID   // \u5bc6\u5c01\u51fa\u4ef7\u62cd\u5356\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    // \u6269\u5c55\u7684\u62cd\u5356\u7ed3\u6784\r\n    struct AuctionV2 {\r\n        AuctionType auctionType;    // \u62cd\u5356\u7c7b\u578b\r\n        uint256 decreaseRate;       // \u8377\u5170\u5f0f\u62cd\u5356\u7684\u4ef7\u683c\u9012\u51cf\u7387\uff08\u6bcf\u5c0f\u65f6\uff09\r\n        uint256 revealDeadline;     // \u5bc6\u5c01\u51fa\u4ef7\u62cd\u5356\u7684\u63ed\u793a\u622a\u6b62\u65f6\u95f4\r\n        uint256 buyNowPrice;        // \u4e00\u53e3\u4ef7\u8d2d\u4e70\u4ef7\u683c\r\n        bool allowBuyNow;           // \u662f\u5426\u5141\u8bb8\u4e00\u53e3\u4ef7\u8d2d\u4e70\r\n        uint256 minimumBidIncrement; // \u6700\u5c0f\u51fa\u4ef7\u589e\u91cf\r\n        address[] bidTokenWhitelist; // \u5141\u8bb8\u7684\u51fa\u4ef7\u4ee3\u5e01\u767d\u540d\u5355\r\n        bool isWhitelistEnabled;    // \u662f\u5426\u542f\u7528\u767d\u540d\u5355\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    // \u5bc6\u5c01\u51fa\u4ef7\u7ed3\u6784\r\n    struct SealedBid {\r\n        bytes32 commitment;         // \u51fa\u4ef7\u627f\u8bfa\uff08\u54c8\u5e0c\uff09\r\n        uint256 deposit;           // \u4fdd\u8bc1\u91d1\r\n        bool revealed;             // \u662f\u5426\u5df2\u63ed\u793a\r\n        uint256 actualBid;         // \u5b9e\u9645\u51fa\u4ef7\uff08\u63ed\u793a\u540e\uff09\r\n        address bidToken;          // \u51fa\u4ef7\u4ee3\u5e01\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    // \u5b58\u50a8\u6269\u5c55\u4fe1\u606f\r\n    mapping(uint256 => AuctionV2) public auctionsV2;\r\n    \r\n    // \u5bc6\u5c01\u51fa\u4ef7\u5b58\u50a8 (auctionId => bidder => SealedBid)\r\n    mapping(uint256 => mapping(address => SealedBid)) public sealedBids;\r\n    \r\n    // \u62cd\u5356ID\u5230\u53c2\u4e0e\u8005\u5217\u8868\u7684\u6620\u5c04\r\n    mapping(uint256 => address[]) public auctionParticipants;\r\n    \r\n    // \u62cd\u5356\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\r\n    struct AuctionStats {\r\n        uint256 totalBids;\r\n        uint256 uniqueBidders;\r\n        uint256 averageBidAmount;\r\n        uint256 lastBidTime;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    mapping(uint256 => AuctionStats) public auctionStats;\r\n    \r\n    // \u7528\u6237\u62cd\u5356\u5386\u53f2\r\n    mapping(address => uint256[]) public userParticipatedAuctions;\r\n    mapping(address => uint256[]) public userWonAuctions;\r\n    \r\n    // \u6279\u91cf\u64cd\u4f5c\u652f\u6301\r\n    struct BatchCreateParams {\r\n        uint256 duration;\r\n        uint256 startPrice;\r\n        uint256 reservePrice;\r\n        address nftContract;\r\n        uint256[] tokenIds;\r\n        AuctionType auctionType;\r\n        uint256 buyNowPrice;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    // \u65b0\u4e8b\u4ef6\r\n    event AuctionV2Created(\r\n        uint256 indexed auctionId,\r\n        AuctionType indexed auctionType,\r\n        uint256 buyNowPrice,\r\n        uint256 minimumBidIncrement\r\n    );\r\n    \r\n    event BuyNowPurchase(\r\n        uint256 indexed auctionId,\r\n        address indexed buyer,\r\n        uint256 price,\r\n        address paymentToken\r\n    );\r\n    \r\n    event SealedBidCommitted(\r\n        uint256 indexed auctionId,\r\n        address indexed bidder,\r\n        bytes32 commitment,\r\n        uint256 deposit\r\n    );\r\n    \r\n    event SealedBidRevealed(\r\n        uint256 indexed auctionId,\r\n        address indexed bidder,\r\n        uint256 actualBid\r\n    );\r\n    \r\n    event DutchAuctionPriceUpdate(\r\n        uint256 indexed auctionId,\r\n        uint256 currentPrice,\r\n        uint256 timestamp\r\n    );\r\n    \r\n    event BatchAuctionCreated(\r\n        uint256[] auctionIds,\r\n        address indexed creator,\r\n        AuctionType auctionType\r\n    );\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u91cd\u65b0\u521d\u59cb\u5316\u51fd\u6570\uff08\u7528\u4e8e\u5347\u7ea7\uff09\r\n     */\r\n    function initializeV2() external {\r\n        // \u786e\u4fdd\u53ea\u80fd\u521d\u59cb\u5316\u4e00\u6b21\r\n        require(nextAuctionId > 0, \"Already initialized\");\r\n        \r\n        // V2 \u7248\u672c\u7684\u521d\u59cb\u5316\u903b\u8f91\r\n        // \u8fd9\u91cc\u53ef\u4ee5\u6dfb\u52a0\u65b0\u7248\u672c\u7279\u6709\u7684\u521d\u59cb\u5316\u4ee3\u7801\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u521b\u5efa V2 \u7248\u672c\u7684\u62cd\u5356\r\n     */\r\n    function createAuctionV2(\r\n        uint256 duration,\r\n        uint256 startPrice,\r\n        uint256 reservePrice,\r\n        address nftAddress,\r\n        uint256 tokenId,\r\n        AuctionType auctionType,\r\n        uint256 buyNowPrice,\r\n        uint256 minimumBidIncrement,\r\n        address[] calldata bidTokenWhitelist\r\n    ) external nonReentrant returns (uint256) {\r\n        // \u8c03\u7528\u7236\u5408\u7ea6\u7684\u521b\u5efa\u62cd\u5356\u51fd\u6570\r\n        uint256 auctionId = nextAuctionId++;\r\n        \r\n        IERC721 nft = IERC721(nftAddress);\r\n        require(nft.ownerOf(tokenId) == msg.sender, \"Not owner of NFT\");\r\n        require(nft.isApprovedForAll(msg.sender, address(this)) || \r\n                nft.getApproved(tokenId) == address(this), \"NFT not approved\");\r\n        \r\n        // \u8f6c\u79fb NFT \u5230\u5408\u7ea6\r\n        nft.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender, address(this), tokenId);\r\n        \r\n        auctions[auctionId] = Auction({\r\n            seller: msg.sender,\r\n            duration: duration,\r\n            startPrice: startPrice,\r\n            startTime: block.timestamp,\r\n            ended: false,\r\n            highestBidder: address(0),\r\n            highestBid: 0,\r\n            nftContract: nftAddress,\r\n            tokenId: tokenId,\r\n            bidToken: address(0),\r\n            originalBidAmount: 0,\r\n            reservePrice: reservePrice\r\n        });\r\n        \r\n        emit AuctionCreated(auctionId, msg.sender, nftAddress, tokenId, startPrice, reservePrice, duration);\r\n        \r\n        // \u8bbe\u7f6e V2 \u7279\u6709\u7684\u5c5e\u6027\r\n        AuctionV2 storage auctionV2 = auctionsV2[auctionId];\r\n        auctionV2.auctionType = auctionType;\r\n        auctionV2.buyNowPrice = buyNowPrice;\r\n        auctionV2.allowBuyNow = buyNowPrice > 0;\r\n        auctionV2.minimumBidIncrement = minimumBidIncrement;\r\n        auctionV2.bidTokenWhitelist = bidTokenWhitelist;\r\n        auctionV2.isWhitelistEnabled = bidTokenWhitelist.length > 0;\r\n        \r\n        if (auctionType == AuctionType.DUTCH) {\r\n            require(reservePrice < startPrice, \"Invalid price range for Dutch auction\");\r\n            auctionV2.decreaseRate = (startPrice - reservePrice) / (duration / 1 hours);\r\n        } else if (auctionType == AuctionType.SEALED_BID) {\r\n            auctionV2.revealDeadline = block.timestamp + duration + 1 days; // \u51fa\u4ef7\u7ed3\u675f\u540e1\u5929\u5185\u63ed\u793a\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        // \u521d\u59cb\u5316\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\r\n        auctionStats[auctionId] = AuctionStats({\r\n            totalBids: 0,\r\n            uniqueBidders: 0,\r\n            averageBidAmount: 0,\r\n            lastBidTime: 0\r\n        });\r\n        \r\n        emit AuctionV2Created(auctionId, auctionType, buyNowPrice, minimumBidIncrement);\r\n        return auctionId;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u6279\u91cf\u521b\u5efa\u62cd\u5356\r\n     */\r\n    function batchCreateAuctions(BatchCreateParams calldata params) \r\n        external \r\n        nonReentrant \r\n        returns (uint256[] memory) \r\n    {\r\n        require(params.tokenIds.length > 0, \"No tokens provided\");\r\n        require(params.tokenIds.length <= 50, \"Too many tokens\"); // \u9650\u5236\u6279\u91cf\u6570\u91cf\r\n        \r\n        uint256[] memory auctionIds = new uint256[](params.tokenIds.length);\r\n        \r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < params.tokenIds.length; i++) {\r\n            auctionIds[i] = this.createAuctionV2(\r\n                params.duration,\r\n                params.startPrice,\r\n                params.reservePrice,\r\n                params.nftContract,\r\n                params.tokenIds[i],\r\n                params.auctionType,\r\n                params.buyNowPrice,\r\n                0, // minimumBidIncrement\r\n                new address[](0) // bidTokenWhitelist\r\n            );\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        emit BatchAuctionCreated(auctionIds, msg.sender, params.auctionType);\r\n        return auctionIds;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u4e00\u53e3\u4ef7\u8d2d\u4e70\r\n     */\r\n    function buyNow(uint256 auctionId, address paymentToken) external payable nonReentrant {\r\n        Auction memory auction = auctions[auctionId];\r\n        AuctionV2 memory auctionV2 = auctionsV2[auctionId];\r\n        \r\n        require(auction.seller != address(0), \"Auction does not exist\");\r\n        require(!auction.ended, \"Auction ended\");\r\n        require(auctionV2.allowBuyNow, \"Buy now not available\");\r\n        require(msg.sender != auction.seller, \"Seller cannot buy\");\r\n        \r\n        // \u68c0\u67e5\u652f\u4ed8\r\n        uint256 usdPrice = auctionV2.buyNowPrice;\r\n        if (paymentToken == address(0)) {\r\n            uint256 usdValue = getTokenPriceInUSD(address(0), msg.value);\r\n            require(usdValue >= usdPrice, \"Insufficient payment\");\r\n        } else {\r\n            require(_isTokenWhitelisted(auctionId, paymentToken), \"Token not whitelisted\");\r\n            uint256 requiredAmount = _calculateTokenAmount(paymentToken, usdPrice);\r\n            IERC20(paymentToken).transferFrom(msg.sender, address(this), requiredAmount);\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        // \u7ed3\u675f\u62cd\u5356\r\n        auctions[auctionId].ended = true;\r\n        auctions[auctionId].highestBidder = msg.sender;\r\n        auctions[auctionId].highestBid = usdPrice;\r\n        auctions[auctionId].bidToken = paymentToken;\r\n        \r\n        // \u6267\u884c\u4ea4\u6613\r\n        _executeSuccessfulAuction(auctionId, auctions[auctionId]);\r\n        \r\n        // \u66f4\u65b0\u7528\u6237\u5386\u53f2\r\n        userWonAuctions[msg.sender].push(auctionId);\r\n        \r\n        emit BuyNowPurchase(auctionId, msg.sender, usdPrice, paymentToken);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u63d0\u4ea4\u5bc6\u5c01\u51fa\u4ef7\u7684\u627f\u8bfa\r\n     */\r\n    function commitSealedBid(\r\n        uint256 auctionId,\r\n        bytes32 commitment\r\n    ) external payable nonReentrant {\r\n        Auction memory auction = auctions[auctionId];\r\n        AuctionV2 memory auctionV2 = auctionsV2[auctionId];\r\n        \r\n        require(auction.seller != address(0), \"Auction does not exist\");\r\n        require(!auction.ended, \"Auction ended\");\r\n        require(auctionV2.auctionType == AuctionType.SEALED_BID, \"Not a sealed bid auction\");\r\n        require(block.timestamp < auction.startTime + auction.duration, \"Bidding period ended\");\r\n        require(msg.value > 0, \"Must send deposit\");\r\n        \r\n        SealedBid storage bid = sealedBids[auctionId][msg.sender];\r\n        require(bid.commitment == bytes32(0), \"Already committed\");\r\n        \r\n        bid.commitment = commitment;\r\n        bid.deposit = msg.value;\r\n        bid.revealed = false;\r\n        \r\n        // \u6dfb\u52a0\u5230\u53c2\u4e0e\u8005\u5217\u8868\r\n        auctionParticipants[auctionId].push(msg.sender);\r\n        userParticipatedAuctions[msg.sender].push(auctionId);\r\n        \r\n        emit SealedBidCommitted(auctionId, msg.sender, commitment, msg.value);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u63ed\u793a\u5bc6\u5c01\u51fa\u4ef7\r\n     */\r\n    function revealSealedBid(\r\n        uint256 auctionId,\r\n        uint256 bidAmount,\r\n        address bidToken,\r\n        uint256 nonce\r\n    ) external nonReentrant {\r\n        Auction storage auction = auctions[auctionId];\r\n        AuctionV2 memory auctionV2 = auctionsV2[auctionId];\r\n        \r\n        require(auction.ended, \"Auction not ended\");\r\n        require(auctionV2.auctionType == AuctionType.SEALED_BID, \"Not a sealed bid auction\");\r\n        require(block.timestamp <= auctionV2.revealDeadline, \"Reveal period ended\");\r\n        \r\n        SealedBid storage bid = sealedBids[auctionId][msg.sender];\r\n        require(bid.commitment != bytes32(0), \"No commitment found\");\r\n        require(!bid.revealed, \"Already revealed\");\r\n        \r\n        // \u9a8c\u8bc1\u627f\u8bfa\r\n        bytes32 hash = keccak256(abi.encodePacked(bidAmount, bidToken, nonce, msg.sender));\r\n        require(hash == bid.commitment, \"Invalid reveal\");\r\n        \r\n        bid.revealed = true;\r\n        bid.actualBid = bidAmount;\r\n        bid.bidToken = bidToken;\r\n        \r\n        // \u8f6c\u6362\u4e3a\u7f8e\u5143\u4ef7\u503c\r\n        uint256 usdValue = getTokenPriceInUSD(bidToken, bidAmount);\r\n        \r\n        // \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u4e3a\u6700\u9ad8\u51fa\u4ef7\r\n        if (usdValue > auction.highestBid) {\r\n            auction.highestBidder = msg.sender;\r\n            auction.highestBid = usdValue;\r\n            auction.bidToken = bidToken;\r\n            auction.originalBidAmount = bidAmount;\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        emit SealedBidRevealed(auctionId, msg.sender, bidAmount);\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u83b7\u53d6\u8377\u5170\u5f0f\u62cd\u5356\u7684\u5f53\u524d\u4ef7\u683c\r\n     */\r\n    function getDutchAuctionCurrentPrice(uint256 auctionId) external view returns (uint256) {\r\n        Auction memory auction = auctions[auctionId];\r\n        AuctionV2 memory auctionV2 = auctionsV2[auctionId];\r\n        \r\n        require(auctionV2.auctionType == AuctionType.DUTCH, \"Not a Dutch auction\");\r\n        require(!auction.ended, \"Auction ended\");\r\n        \r\n        uint256 timeElapsed = block.timestamp - auction.startTime;\r\n        uint256 priceDecrease = (timeElapsed / 1 hours) * auctionV2.decreaseRate;\r\n        \r\n        if (priceDecrease >= auction.startPrice - auction.reservePrice) {\r\n            return auction.reservePrice;\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        return auction.startPrice - priceDecrease;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u83b7\u53d6\u62cd\u5356\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\r\n     */\r\n    function getAuctionStats(uint256 auctionId) external view returns (AuctionStats memory) {\r\n        return auctionStats[auctionId];\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u83b7\u53d6\u7528\u6237\u53c2\u4e0e\u7684\u62cd\u5356\u5217\u8868\r\n     */\r\n    function getUserParticipatedAuctions(address user) external view returns (uint256[] memory) {\r\n        return userParticipatedAuctions[user];\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u83b7\u53d6\u7528\u6237\u8d62\u5f97\u7684\u62cd\u5356\u5217\u8868\r\n     */\r\n    function getUserWonAuctions(address user) external view returns (uint256[] memory) {\r\n        return userWonAuctions[user];\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u83b7\u53d6\u62cd\u5356\u53c2\u4e0e\u8005\u5217\u8868\r\n     */\r\n    function getAuctionParticipants(uint256 auctionId) external view returns (address[] memory) {\r\n        return auctionParticipants[auctionId];\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u68c0\u67e5\u4ee3\u5e01\u662f\u5426\u5728\u767d\u540d\u5355\u4e2d\r\n     */\r\n    function _isTokenWhitelisted(uint256 auctionId, address token) internal view returns (bool) {\r\n        AuctionV2 memory auctionV2 = auctionsV2[auctionId];\r\n        \r\n        if (!auctionV2.isWhitelistEnabled) {\r\n            return true;\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < auctionV2.bidTokenWhitelist.length; i++) {\r\n            if (auctionV2.bidTokenWhitelist[i] == token) {\r\n                return true;\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        return false;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u6839\u636e\u7f8e\u5143\u4ef7\u503c\u8ba1\u7b97\u6240\u9700\u7684\u4ee3\u5e01\u6570\u91cf\r\n     */\r\n    function _calculateTokenAmount(address token, uint256 usdValue) internal view returns (uint256) {\r\n        AggregatorV3Interface priceFeed = priceFeeds[token];\r\n        require(address(priceFeed) != address(0), \"Price feed not set\");\r\n        \r\n        (, int256 price, , , ) = priceFeed.latestRoundData();\r\n        require(price > 0, \"Invalid price\");\r\n        \r\n        uint8 decimals = priceFeed.decimals();\r\n        uint256 priceInUSD = (uint256(price) * (10 ** 18)) / (10 ** decimals);\r\n        \r\n        return (usdValue * (10 ** 18)) / priceInUSD;\r\n    }\r\n    \r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev \u91cd\u5199\u7236\u5408\u7ea6\u7684\u51fa\u4ef7\u51fd\u6570\u4ee5\u652f\u6301 V2 \u529f\u80fd\r\n     */\r\n    function _placeBid(\r\n        uint256 auctionId,\r\n        address tokenAddress,\r\n        uint256 amount,\r\n        uint256 usdValue\r\n    ) internal override {\r\n        AuctionV2 memory auctionV2 = auctionsV2[auctionId];\r\n        \r\n        // \u68c0\u67e5\u4ee3\u5e01\u767d\u540d\u5355\r\n        require(_isTokenWhitelisted(auctionId, tokenAddress), \"Token not whitelisted\");\r\n        \r\n        // \u68c0\u67e5\u6700\u5c0f\u51fa\u4ef7\u589e\u91cf\r\n        if (auctionV2.minimumBidIncrement > 0) {\r\n            Auction memory auction = auctions[auctionId];\r\n            require(\r\n                usdValue >= auction.highestBid + auctionV2.minimumBidIncrement,\r\n                \"Bid increment too small\"\r\n            );\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        // \u68c0\u67e5\u62cd\u5356\u7c7b\u578b\r\n        if (auctionV2.auctionType == AuctionType.SEALED_BID) {\r\n            revert(\"Use commitSealedBid for sealed bid auctions\");\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        // \u8c03\u7528\u7236\u5408\u7ea6\u7684\u51fa\u4ef7\u903b\u8f91\r\n        super._placeBid(auctionId, tokenAddress, amount, usdValue);\r\n        \r\n        // \u66f4\u65b0\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\r\n        AuctionStats storage stats = auctionStats[auctionId];\r\n        stats.totalBids++;\r\n        stats.lastBidTime = block.timestamp;\r\n        \r\n        // \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u4e3a\u65b0\u7684\u51fa\u4ef7\u8005\r\n        bool isNewBidder = bidRecords[auctionId][msg.sender] == 0;\r\n        if (isNewBidder) {\r\n            stats.uniqueBidders++;\r\n            auctionParticipants[auctionId].push(msg.sender);\r\n            userParticipatedAuctions[msg.sender].push(auctionId);\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        // \u66f4\u65b0\u5e73\u5747\u51fa\u4ef7\r\n        stats.averageBidAmount = (stats.averageBidAmount * (stats.totalBids - 1) + usdValue) / stats.totalBids;\r\n        \r\n        // \u8377\u5170\u5f0f\u62cd\u5356\u7279\u6b8a\u5904\u7406\r\n        if (auctionV2.auctionType == AuctionType.DUTCH) {\r\n            uint256 currentPrice = this.getDutchAuctionCurrentPrice(auctionId);\r\n            emit DutchAuctionPriceUpdate(auctionId, currentPrice, block.timestamp);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n}","keccak256":"0xb9dc37dfcfc7ff3ddab0d4591aeb7a9ed7fa133527fe0a231aebcb595f9624d6","license":"MIT"}},"version":1}
